articles.title: v1.15.0

articles.description: This vulnerability allows local attackers to escalate privileges on affected installations of ZyXel AP Configurator. An attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.
articles.title: ZDI-22-879: ZyXel AP Configurator Incorrect Permission Assignment Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability

articles.description: This vulnerability allows local attackers to bypass System Integrity Protection on affected installations of Apple macOS. An attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.
articles.title: ZDI-22-878: Apple macOS PackageKit PKInstallService Directory Traversal System Integrity Protection Bypass Vulnerability

articles.description: This vulnerability allows local attackers to bypass System Integrity Protection on affected installations of Apple macOS. An attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.
articles.title: ZDI-22-877: Apple macOS PackageKit PKCoreShove Link Following System Integrity Protection Bypass Vulnerability

articles.description: This vulnerability allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code on affected installations of Apache HTTPD Server. Authentication is not required to exploit this vulnerability.
articles.title: ZDI-22-876: Apache HTTPD Server ap_escape_html2 Integer Overflow Remote Code Execution Vulnerability

articles.description: This vulnerability allows local attackers to create a denial-of-service condition on affected installations of ABB e-Design. An attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.
articles.title: ZDI-22-875: ABB e-Design Link Following Denial-of-Service Vulnerability

articles.description: This vulnerability allows local attackers to escalate privileges on affected installations of ABB e-Design. An attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.
articles.title: ZDI-22-874: ABB e-Design Link Following Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability

articles.description: This vulnerability allows remote attackers to create a denial-of-service condition on affected installations of Prosys OPC UA SDK for Java. Authentication is not required to exploit this vulnerability.
articles.title: ZDI-22-873: (Pwn2Own) Prosys OPC UA SDK for Java OPC UA Messages Resource Exhaustion Denial-of-Service Vulnerability

articles.description: This vulnerability allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code on affected installations of DevExpress. Authentication is required to exploit this vulnerability.
articles.title: ZDI-22-872: DevExpress SafeBinaryFormatter Deserialization of Untrusted Data Remote Code Execution Vulnerability

articles.description: This vulnerability allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code on affected installations of Microsoft SharePoint Server. Authentication is required to exploit this vulnerability.
articles.title: ZDI-22-871: Microsoft SharePoint Chart Deserialization of Untrusted Data Remote Code Execution Vulnerability

articles.description: This vulnerability allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code on affected installations of SAP 3D Visual Enterprise Viewer. User interaction is required to exploit this vulnerability in that the target must visit a malicious page or open a malicious file.
articles.title: ZDI-22-870: SAP 3D Visual Enterprise Viewer CGM File Parsing Out-Of-Bounds Write Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
